quote: But on the other hand I believe I'm a private person too, and I enjoy that aspect of my life as well.
I'm a very private person, a very bookish person. The social world of Hollywood I know nothing about because I choose not to take part.
As a private person I think I am now totally different from Ruud van Nistelrooy the footballer.
I'm just not a private person. It's not like I do things because I want things to be public; it's just that's my way of expressing myself, and I happen to be very famous.
I am really two people. I am a private person and a political person. Of course, if there is a conflict, the political person comes first.
I'm a very private person.
I'm a very private person.

I'm a very private person, so I didn't like this idea of tweeting about me. And then I realized, 'Oh, this is actually a brilliant device in terms of interacting with the fans'. It's a lovely way to just get back, to thank the fans for watching the show. And to live tweet is kind of like getting the rewards of doing live theatre.
I'm a very private person, so I didn't like this idea of tweeting about me. And then I realized, 'Oh, this is actually a brilliant device in terms of interacting with the fans.'
I am a very private person. I still get shy at times.
I have a Facebook page and a website. Beyond that, I'm actually a very private person. I'd rather see the focus on the books than on me.
I always have been a private person. I like to be alone. When I was a little girl I used to listen to the radio and just be by myself.

I was 26 when I went to my first acting class. I'm naturally quite shy. I'm a quite private person. There's this really strange acting class in New York called Black Nexxus. For someone who's slightly shy or self-conscious, it's the most frightening thing you can do.
I was never one to seek out the spotlight. I am kind of a private person, so I don't miss that part of show business at all.
I'm very expressive, but I'm also a very private person. It is so hard to be private in the entertainment business.
I am a private person and that has always been my personality.
At the same time that I love meeting people and stuff, I'm a very private person.
I'm kind of a private person in a way.
I'm a fairly quiet and private person. So I haven't sought publicity.
He was a very private person, but then, you know, he belonged to the whole United States. The United States thought they owned Johnny Carson.
I don't have Facebook; I don't have Twitter. I don't have anything because, believe it or not, I'm a very, very private person! I don't even have WhatsApp! I don't like to pry into people's business.
I'm the most private person.
At home, I am a private person, and I like keeping it that way. Maybe that is why I come out as being guarded about my personal life.

If I had my way, I wouldn't be sharing my personal life online. I'm a private person. At home, I don't wander around shirtless, flexing my muscles. I roam around unshaven, with my hair disheveled. Unfortunately, people perceive you differently. It's okay; they're free to speculate.
I'm a pretty private person, so I'd like to say I'm a good ear and that I keep my mouth shut.
I am an extremely private person. I always feel that I come across as a caricature of myself whenever I do interviews.
I'm a very private person. I don't go out much. I'm home with kids. I go to work. I don't really like being the focus of attention, which is why I like being behind the camera more.
I'm a private person, and I don't want people knowing what kind of underwear I like. It's creepy!

As a devoted mother and private person, and with complete awareness that my daughter will one day be old enough to read the news about herself, I would only like to say that I will never, ever be commenting on the dissolution of my marriage.
I am a very private person. I don't like to talk about things till someone asks about them.

The grand surprise has really been the fact that being an author, which to me had always implied being a private person, actually requires you to be a public person as well, and those are two separate entities to me.
I'm a very private person.

I'm not a private person. I like hanging out and talking to fans. But my life isn't so interesting that you want to see the inside of it.
I wish I could write more make-believe. It's a lot easier to write about hard times and when things are going wrong. But I've never been a private person.
I'm a pretty private person. I live in Texas, and I like my small network.
I am a private person. I don't need a lot of company. And I find it really, really difficult to talk about myself.
By nature, I think I am a pretty private person, and that is what is hard even doing interviews for films that I really love doing, because in some ways, it diminishes the experience that I had.
I think it's difficult, if you're a quite private person like I am, to write about your life very intimately.

I want to let my fans get to know a little about me. I'm very thankful for everything they've done for me so, of course, I'm going to let them into my world a bit. But I really am a very private person, and I love kepping my life to myself - that's how I've always been.
It's a real wrenching thing to go from being a private person to being a public person, especially when you're being autobiographical.
I'm a private person who doesn't relish making her personal life public.

I have heard all kinds of stories about telling employers about MS and I really don't know what the answer is. I am a private person, but I have found support by talking to fellow MSrs in the community.
I'm a private person, but I don't feel afraid to walk out of my door or anything. I get recognised occasionally, but not overwhelmingly so.
I am not a private person; you can ask those who hang out with me.
I'm a very private person, and I don't want to share stuff with anyone.
I'm a fairly private person.
I'm a very private person.
I'm a very private person.

I'm a very private person. I barely tell my friends what's going on half the time, so the idea that I should then talk to the world about what is going on seems anathema to me. People can say what they want. I'm not going to change anyone's mind.
I was an unusually private person - in a way, kind of insufferably so. I think I thought the celebrity thing when it happened was a temporary phenomenon, and I was above it.
I'm a private person.

As a private person, I am maybe more 'Eurovision' than Kasper Juul.

I'm a private person; I stick to my neighbourhood and eat in my little restaurants.

I'm kind of a private person.

I can be a show-off at home. But publicly, I have always been a private person. It's not totally my bag to court the press.
I am quite a private person.

I'm a private person.

I have got a fantastic life and I just like to get on with it, and I am quite a private person.
I've always been a very private person.
When I am not on the stage, it is always very difficult for the public to find me! I am a private person who does not always want to be in the spotlight!

I have to be a lot more calculating because I'm a very private person. I actually really struggle with the attention; I'm generally a pretty shy kind of a person. So it's tough figuring out how to manage it. But there are ways of managing it, and you just have to be smart.
I am a private person; I think that's important if you're an actor. But there's a difference between privacy and secrecy, and I'm not a secretive person.

I was such a private person before I started 'The Talk.' I don't know what happened! It almost feels like I've started a second life. In my previous lifetime, I didn't talk about stuff. Now I'll discuss anything. It's crazy!

I know I have a reputation that is not so flattering, but I guess I owe it to just being a private person. I don't mean anyone harm, and I'm not being mean. I just don't socialise much; I don't party too much. I don't know what to say to the media if I'm not talking about a film that I am doing, so yeah, maybe I am perceived as a snob.
I'm a very private person. I like staying home and doing my stuff. I hate people invading on my privacy. I hate talking about my private life.

There are certain things about me that I will never tell to anyone because I am a very private person. But basically, what you see is who I am. I'm independent, I do like to be liked, I do look for the good side of life and people. I'm positive, I'm disciplined, I like my life in order, and I'm neat as a pin.
I'm a very loyal and very private person when it comes to my personal life. But I obviously do have Twitter and Instagram, and I will share some of the things I'm doing.
I am a very private person. No one ever knows anything about me as I don't think it is necessary. I tell people as much as I want them to know about me.
I'm a private person by nature. I live in my brain half the time, not the world, and I'm not a natural negotiator. But I've learned to negotiate.

I am kind of a private person, so I don't miss that part of show business at all. Looking back on my career in television and making a movie like 'The Sound of Music' from an adult point of view, it actually seems kind of unreal. I was involved in shows that people grew up with - that hold memories for them - and it's a cool feeling.

I am a very reclusive, private person.
I've always been a private person, and I've always valued my private life.
I prefer to be a private person.
I'm a very private person, and perhaps this can be mistaken for aloofness.
I'm a very private person that prefers a low profile.
I'm a very private person. My life story isn't for everybody.

I want to be remembered as the football player I was. The private person is nobody's business.

I am basically a private person.

I'm a private person in many ways.
